title: Get Started
text: WebTrials R package helps easily create Shiny web apps randomizing participants clinical trials. provides ready-made templates tools set different types. -package designed anyone involved clinical trials needs straightforward way manage participant randomization using web app.

title: Get Started
text: Install latest development version GitHub (requires devtools package):
code: TEST if (!require("devtools")) {   install.packages("devtools") } devtools::install_github("MAEMOD-MORU/WebTrials", dependencies = TRUE, build_vignettes = FALSE)

title: Get Started
text: image shows structure files folders created package template installed:

title: Get Started
text: data: contains data files token file used app. dropbox_data: contain data synchronized Dropbox used cloud storage integration. www: Commonly used Shiny apps store static assets images, CSS files, JavaScript files.

title: Get Started
text: report.Rmd report2.Rmd: R Markdown files, likely used generating dynamic reports based data results app. shiny_app.R: main R script Shiny app includes code build run app interface. structure provides foundation building Shiny app manages clinical trial randomization, supports data integration, generates dynamic reports.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Wichaita T (2024). WebTrials: 'WebTrials' Template Shiny Web Clinical Trials. R package version 0.1.0, https://maemod-moru.github.io/WebTrials/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {WebTrials: 'WebTrials' Template Shiny Web For Clinical Trials},   author = {Tanaphum Wichaita},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://maemod-moru.github.io/WebTrials/}, }

what: WebTrials Template Shiny Web For Clinical Trials
title: WebTrials Template Shiny Web For Clinical Trials
code: if (!require("devtools")) {   install.packages("devtools") } devtools::install_github("MAEMOD-MORU/WebTrials", dependencies = TRUE, build_vignettes = FALSE)

title: WebTrials Template Shiny Web For Clinical Trials
text: WebTrials R package helps easily create Shiny web apps randomizing participants clinical trials. #### Key Features: * Pre-built Templates: Creating pre-built Shiny app templates. * User Authentication Security: Supports user authentication role-based access control ensure authorized personnel can access (shinymanager) * Deployment Flexibility: Facilitates easy deployment Shiny apps either locally, server, via cloud services. #### Use Cases: * Clinical Trial Coordination: Helps trial coordinators statisticians set manage randomization processes minimal programming knowledge. * Regulatory Compliance: Ensures randomization procedures meet necessary regulatory requirements secure data handling detailed audit trails.

title: generate dropbox token — dropbox_token
code: dropbox_token(   new_user = FALSE,   dir = NULL,   key = "mmhfsybffdom42w",   secret = "l8zeqqqgm1ne5z0",   cache = TRUE,   rdstoken = NA )

title: generate dropbox token — dropbox_token
text: new_user TRUE means generate new token dir set directory token file.

title: Generate Shiny app — generate_shiny_app
text: function launches simple Shiny app text input output.

title: Generate Shiny app — generate_shiny_app
code: generate_shiny_app(   dir = NULL,   name = "shiny_app",   create_token = T,   login_page = T )

title: Generate Shiny app — generate_shiny_app
text: dir set directory output files. name set name Shiny app.
